Text: this is for xbox 360, NOT pc.
no comments? what do you people think?
any chance you can explain in a bit more detail on what to do with this file???

you open the editor, you extract your gamesave off your hdd, put it on your comp., from there all you do is drag your save into the app, mod your shit, hit the blue circle button, hit save, let it rehash and resign itself, then just put your modded save back where you go it..overwriting your current save, thats it! :)
worked for me but had to use yaris swap
